alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Lapeer; Livingston; Macomb; Oakland; Shiawassee; St. Clair; Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 4:25PM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...CAUTIOUS TRAVEL IS ADVISED FOR SNOW-COVERED ROADWAYS AND REDUCED VISIBILITIES DURING THE EVENING COMMUTE... WEATHER... * Intermittent light to moderate snow showers will impact southeastern Michigan during the evening commute. * A dusting to 1 inch of snow will be possible for areas impacted between 4 pm and 7 pm. * West winds around 15 mph with gusts to 25 mph. * Air temperatures will range between 25 and 28 degrees. IMPACTS... * Accumulating snow may lead to slippery roads particularly on bridges, exit ramps and overpasses. * Embedded moderate snow showers will cause reductions of visibility to less than one mile. The fluctuations of visibility may be sudden. && PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... * The combination of moderate Snow and cold temperatures will result in localized slippery conditions and variable traffic rates throughout the county. Motorists are urged to use caution and account for the variability in driving conditions by allowing extra time. * Prepare, plan and stay informed. Visit http://go.usa.gov/c7kkP
